trans-unit.note: Action/button to add database to the app

Placeholder shown when there are no database files available
Settings switch: whether to include backup copies in the file list
Copyright notice

trans-unit.target: Нажмите дважды, чтобы скопировать в буфер обмена

Hint/Description why the user is asked to provide their fingerprint. Shown in the standard Touch ID prompt.
Call to action in the passcode input dialog.
Action: change keyboard type to enter alphanumeric passphrases
Action: change keyboard type to enter PIN numbers
Type of keyboard to show for App Lock passcode: letters and digits.
Type of keyboard to show for App Lock passcode: digits only (PIN code).

trans-unit.source: Your organization requires a more complex passcode.
trans-unit.target: Ваша организация требует использовать более сложный код доступа.
trans-unit.note: Notification for business users when they set up too weak app protection passcode.
Hint/call to action about keyboard shortcut
Call to action in the passcode input dialog.
Action/button to switch from TouchID/FaceID prompt to manual input of the AppLock passcode.
Action/button to modify the existing AppLock passcode.
Notification that the modified AppLock passcode has been saved.
Action/button to save new or edited AppLock passcode.
Action/button to unlock the App Lock with passcode
Short name of the default/system font. For example: `Font: Default`
Title of a setting option: font
Title of a setting option: font size
Group of settings for user interface appearance (text size, icons, etc)

trans-unit.id: [AutoFill/Premium/Upgrade/Manual/text] To upgrade, please manually open KeePassium from your home screen.
trans-unit.source: To upgrade, please manually open KeePassium from your home screen.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы включить премиум-доступ, откройте основное приложение KeePassium.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when AutoFill cannot automatically open the main app for upgrading to a premium version.
Title of a message related to upgrading to the premium version
Name of biometric authentication method. Trademarked, do not translate unless Apple traslated it to your language.
Name of biometric authentication method. Trademarked, do not translate unless Apple traslated it to your language.
Error message when the challenge-response communication has been cancelled by the user.
Error message when the hardware key is not plugged in.

trans-unit.source: Hardware keys are not available in AutoFill.
trans-unit.note: Error message when trying to use challenge-response hardware in AutoFill.

trans-unit.source: Hardware keys are not supported by this database format.
trans-unit.target: Аппаратные ключи не поддерживаются этим форматом базы паролей.
trans-unit.note: Error message when trying to use challenge-response with a kdb database.

trans-unit.source: This device or iOS version does not support hardware keys (%@)
trans-unit.target: Это устройство или версия iOS не поддерживает аппаратные ключи (%@)

trans-unit.source: Hardware key is not configured for challenge-response.
trans-unit.target: Аппаратный ключ не настроен для аутентификации вызов-ответ.
trans-unit.note: Error message: the hardware key (or its slot) was not configured for challenge-response operations.
Progress status
Progress status
Action copy some named value to clipboard. For example: `Copy Password`. [valueName: String]
Notification: an item has been copied to clipboard
Subtitle for `Contact Us`. Keep it short.

Error message about AES cipher. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about Argon2 hashing function. [errorCode: Int]

Error message about PKCS7 padding. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about random number generator. [errorCode: Int]

Action/button to create a new database
Title of a form for creating a database
Action: download icon of a website
Action/button to download favicons of websites mentioned in selected entries.
Report of favicon download results.
Status message: multiple website favicons are being downloaded
Status message: a website favicon is being downloaded
Action: add/import an image as a custom icon

trans-unit.id: [Database/Delete/Confirm/text] Delete database file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.source: Delete database file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.target: Удалить файл базы паролей? Убедитесь, что у вас есть резервная копия.
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm deletion of a database file. (This deletes the file itself)
Action to modify database encryption settings.
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Example: 'Encryption Algorithm: AES-256'
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the number of times/iterations a calculation (transform) should be executed. Example: 'Transform Rounds: 100'
Parameter name in database encryption settings. This is a term, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Key_derivation_function. Example: 'Key Derivation Function: Argon2'

trans-unit.source: High memory requirements can make this database incompatible with Password AutoFill.
trans-unit.target: Высокие требования к памяти могут сделать эту базу несовместимой с функцией автозаполнения паролей.
trans-unit.note: Warning for too high value of the `Memory usage` parameter in database encryption settings.
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the amount of memory that should be used by an algorithm. Example: 'Memory Usage: 16 MB'
Action/button button in database encryption settings. Resets the settings to recommended values.
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the number of computations to run in parallel/simultaneously. Example: 'Parallelism: 2 threads'
Title: database encryption settings.

trans-unit.source: All your data will be preserved.
trans-unit.note: Info message when changing database file format.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs to upgrade your database file format (from %1$@ to %2$@). You might need to update other apps that use this database.
trans-unit.target: Необходимо обновить формат базы данных (с %1$@ на %2$@). Может потребоваться обновить другие приложения, использующие эту базу данных.
trans-unit.note: Info message when the app needs to change database file format. [oldFormat, newFormat: String]
Title of an info message when the app needs to change database file format.
Title of an icon collection: icons provided by the system
Status of a database item (entry or group) after it was edited.

trans-unit.source: This is an older database format, some data might be lost.

trans-unit.source: This database is protected by your corporate IT policies and Microsoft Intune.
trans-unit.target: Эта база данных защищена вашей корпоративной политикой в области ИТ и Microsoft Intune.

trans-unit.target: База паролей доступна только для чтения

Action/button: change master key of a database.

trans-unit.source: If you ever forget it, you won't be able to access your data. There is no password reset option.

Imperative/recommendation: title of a warning when changing database password.
Notification after changing database master key
Action/button
Action: lock database
Action: ignore warnings and proceed to work with the database

Title of a list with database-related actions (e.g. lock database, change master key, etc)
Status message: preparing database print preview.
Database loading/saving status: checking whether our database was modified from another device.
Database loading status: fetching the database file from disk/cloud

Status message: saving a database

Title: what to do when (remote) file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Show Error`.)
Title: what to do when (remote) file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Use Local Copy`.)
File settings parameter: what to do when (remote) file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Use Local Copy`.)
Title of settings section (read-only, backup-able, etc)
File setting title, whether the file can be modified (yes/no).

trans-unit.source:
Attachments of some entries are missing data. This is a sign of database corruption, most likely by the last used app (%1$@). KeePassium will preserve the empty attachments, but cannot restore them. You should restore your database from a backup copy.
Missing attachments: %2$@
trans-unit.target:
Прикреплённые файлы в некоторых записях не имеют содержимого. Это признак повреждения базы паролей, возможно, последним использованным приложением (%1$@). KeePassium оставит эти пустые прикреплённые файлы, но не сможет восстановить их. Советуем восстановить базу из резервной копии.
Отсутствующие прикреплённые файлы: %2$@
trans-unit.note: A warning about missing attachments after loading the database. [lastUsedAppName: String, attachmentNames: String]

trans-unit.source:
Some entries have attachments without a name. This is a sign of previous database corruption.
Please review attached files in the following entries (and their history): %@
trans-unit.target:
Некоторые записи содержат прикреплённые файлы без имени. Это признак повреждённой базы паролей.
Проверьте прикреплённые файлы в следующих записях (и их прошлых версиях): %@
trans-unit.note: A warning about nameless attachments, shown after loading the database. [listOfEntryNames: String]

trans-unit.source:
Some entries have custom field(s) with empty names. This can be a sign of data corruption. Please check these entries:
%@
trans-unit.target:
Некоторые записи содержат поля без названий. Это может быть признаком повреждённой базы. Проверьте следующие записи:
%@
trans-unit.note: A warning about misformatted custom fields after loading the database. [entryPaths: String]

trans-unit.source: The database contains some attachments that are not used in any entry. Most likely, they have been forgotten by the last used app (%@). However, this can also be a sign of data corruption. Please make sure to have a backup of your database before changing anything.
trans-unit.target: База содержит прикреплённые данные, которые не используются ни в одной записи. Скорее всего, они были забыты предыдущей программой (%@), но это может быть и признаком повреждения базы. Перед тем как что-либо редактировать, убедитесь, что у Вас есть резервная копия базы паролей.
trans-unit.note: A warning about unused attachments after loading the database. [lastUsedAppName: String]

trans-unit.note: A suggestion shown after specific file errors (either databases or key files).
Action: re-add (a broken) database or key file to the app.

trans-unit.source: This is a temporary backup database. It can be automatically deleted without a warning. Don't use it as your main database.
trans-unit.target: Это временная копия базы данных. Она может быть автоматически удалена без предупреждения. Не используйте её как основную базу.
trans-unit.note: Notification when user opens an in-app backup database.

trans-unit.source: Storage provider is not available. Please check whether it is installed and logged in to your account.
trans-unit.target: Хранилище файлов недоступно. Убедитесь, что соответствующее приложение установлено и подключено к вашему аккаунту.
trans-unit.note: Error message: storage provider app was logged out or uninstalled.

trans-unit.source: %@ is not available. Please check whether it is installed and logged in to your account.
trans-unit.target: %@ недоступен. Убедитесь, что соответствующее приложение установлено и подключено к вашему аккаунту.
trans-unit.note: Error message: storage provider app was logged out or uninstalled [fileProviderName: String].
Error message: the required network drive is not connected.
Error message: there is no USB drive connected to the device.

trans-unit.source: Access to this storage is disabled by your organization.
trans-unit.target: Доступ к этому хранилищу отключён вашей организацией.
trans-unit.note: Error message: organization's IT administrator has forbidden access to a data storage location.

trans-unit.source: Network access is blocked by the settings.
trans-unit.note: Error message: network access is forbidden by system or app settings.
Error message: storage provider app (e.g. Google Drive) does not respond to requests.
Error message: file provider does not respond to requests. For example: `Google Drive does not respond.`
Error message: file provider does not support write operations. For example: `Cannot save file (OneDrive)`

trans-unit.source: Microsoft has recently switched OneDrive integration with iOS to read-only mode. Temporarily, they say.
trans-unit.target: Недавно Microsoft перевела интеграцию OneDrive с iOS в режим только чтения. Как говорят, временно.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of a file writing error

trans-unit.source: Use the Export option to save file to another location.
trans-unit.target: Используйте функцию экспорта, чтобы сохранить файл в другом месте.
trans-unit.note: Suggestion for error recovery

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs your permission to access '%@'.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium требуется разрешение на доступ к '%@'.
trans-unit.note: Error message for file with an expired access permission [fileName: String].

trans-unit.source: Select the file again to allow access

Number of bits. For example: '123 bits of entropy'. IMPORTANT: Please fill out all the plural forms. (Key in .stringsdict)

Action/button to finish (editing) and keep changes

Action/button to replace an item with another one

Action/button to share an item with another app (AirDrop, send an email, etc)
Action/button to show additional information about an error or item
Action/button to show sensitive info as it is, in plain text (as opposed to asterisks)
Checkbox/Button to show a text field in its full size

trans-unit.source: These hardware keys are not available in AutoFill.

trans-unit.note: Information notice for a list of hardware keys.
Name of an input field which shows selected hardware key
Connector type for older Apple devices, used through a USB adapter. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lightning_(connector)

trans-unit.source: USB is not available, because this is an iPad app running on macOS. Use the native Mac app instead.

Master key/unlock option: use given slot of YubiKey
Generic title of in-app help article

trans-unit.source: To protect its data, your organization needs to manage this app. To complete this action, sign in with your work or school account.

Notification that an archived/historical item (e.g entry) has been successfully restored
Title of a list with advanced/expert-level properties of a database item (e.g. entry)

Possible value of the `Password AutoFill` setting. For example: 'Password AutoFill: Disabled'

Possible value of the `Password Audit` setting. For example: 'Password Audit: Disabled'

Possible value of the `Search` setting. Example: 'Search: Allowed'
Possible value of the `Search` setting, when the item should be excluded from search results. Example: 'Search: Disabled'
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be considered during search. Example: 'Search: Allowed'
Default value of an item property. For example: 'Password Audit: Inherit from parent group (Allowed)'. [inheritedValue: String]

User-defined set of characters for password generator.

trans-unit.source: Increase the length parameter to at least %d.

Action/button: generate random text/password/phrase
Description of randomly generated text/password/phrase
Inclusion criterion for a password generator. For example: `Digits: Allowed`
Inclusion criterion for a password generator. For example: `Uppercase Letters: Excluded`
Inclusion criterion for a password generator — a disabled/inactive one that won't be taken into account. For example: `Uppercase Letters: Inactive`
Inclusion criterion for a password generator. For example: `Special Symbols: Required`
Length (number of characters) of the random text to generate

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of identical characters repeating consecutively.

trans-unit.source: Increase the limit on maximum number of identical elements repeating consecutively.

One of the operation modes of the random text generator
One of the operation modes of the random text generator

trans-unit.source: Need more elements to pick from.
trans-unit.note: Error message from the random text generator.
Length (number of characters) of the password to generate

Title for digits (like '123')
Title for look-alike symbols (like '1lI', that is: digit `1`, small `L`, capital `i`).
Title for lowercase letters (like 'abc')
Title for special symbols (like '@#$')
Title for uppercase letters (like 'ABC')
Name of the space character. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_(punctuation)
Character to be inserted between words of a passphrase.
Word capitalization style. Written in that style, if possible.
Word capitalization style: first letters of significant words capitalized. Written in that style, if possible.
Case of letters in a word (e.g. UPPER, lower, Title Case)
Word capitalization style. Written in that style, if possible.
Number of words in a generated passphrase. In context: 'Words: 5'
Name of a wordlist for passphrase generator. `EFF` is an organization name.
Name of a wordlist for passphrase generator. `EFF` is an organization name.

trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature
Title of a premium feature
Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Make KeePassium look unique, familiar, or disguise it as a calculator — the choice is yours.

What's included in a price plan

What's included in a price plan. Please leave `perpetual fallback license` in English.

What's included in a subscription plan. By subscribing for a certain period, the user receives a permanent license for a version of the app. More info: https://keepassium.com/articles/perpetual-fallback-license/

Price of the free pricing plan
Name of the free pricing plan
Marks the default pricing plan

trans-unit.source:
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.
trans-unit.target:
Оплата будет снята с вашего аккаунта Apple ID после подтверждения покупки.
Подписка автоматически возобновляется, если не отменена минимум за 24 часа до конца текущего периода. Плата за продление подписки будет снята с вашего аккаунта в течение суток до окончания текущего периода.
Вы можете изменить или отменить подписки, зайдя в настройки своего аккаунта в App Store после покупки.
trans-unit.note: Subscription conditions
Trial conditions. For example `30 days free, then $1 per month`

Status: premium subscription has expired. For example: `Expired 1 day ago`. [timeFormatted: String, includes the time unit (day, hour, minute)]
Status: licensed premium version of the app. For example: `Licensed version: 1.23`. [version: String]

Title of a premium feature: access to company's cloud accounts like 'OneDrive for Business'
Title of a premium feature: ability to change the app icon

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to Premium and enjoy KeePassium at its best.
trans-unit.target: Перейдите на полную версию KeePassium и пользуйтесь всеми возможностями программы.
trans-unit.note: A generic description of a premium feature
A generic title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Strengthen your security with hardware keys (YubiKey) in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Усильте безопасность с помощью аппаратных ключей (YubiKey) в премиум-версии приложения.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Hardware Keys` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability use hardware keys (e.g. YubiKey) for encryption (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/LongDBTimeouts/description] Save time entering your complex master passwords — keep your database open longer in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Save time entering your complex master passwords — keep your database open longer in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Экономьте время на вводе сложных мастер-паролей — держите базу открытой дольше в премиум-версии приложения.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Long Database Timeouts` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to set long delays in Database Lock Timeout settings (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/MultiDB/description] Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Переключайтесь между базами легко и быстро в премиум-версии.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Multiple Databases` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to use multiple databases (In Title Case)

trans-unit.source: Find out if any of your passwords have been exposed in a known data breach.
trans-unit.target: Узнайте, были ли обнародованы какие-либо ваши пароли из-за утечек данных.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Password Audit` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: discover which passwords are known to be compromized

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/Preview/description] Preview images and documents directly in the app, in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Preview images and documents directly in the app, in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Просматривайте изображения и документы прямо в премиум-версии программы.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Preview Attachments` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to preview some attached files directly in the app (In Title Case)

trans-unit.source: Fill out login forms with a single tap, without even opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Заполняйте формы одним нажатием, даже не открывая KeePassium.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Quick AutoFill` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: show relevant AutoFill entries right under the input field

trans-unit.source: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data nor share it with anyone.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium не собирает персональные или аналитические данные и никому их не передаёт.
trans-unit.note: A brief summary of the privacy policy (for offline mode)

trans-unit.source: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data. Some features may involve data exchange with external services (on your request and for the sole purpose of making these services available to you). Such an exchange is governed by the privacy policy of the respective service.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium не собирает никаких персональных или аналитических данных. Некоторые функции могут включать обмен данными с внешними сервисами (по вашему запросу и с единственной целью сделать эти сервисы доступными для вас). Такой обмен регулируется политикой конфиденциальности соответствующего сервиса.
trans-unit.note: A brief summary of the privacy policy (for online mode)
Section: privacy policy

trans-unit.source: Not enough memory to continue. This can happen with larger databases or too ambitious database settings (Argon2 memory parameter).
trans-unit.target: Недостаточно памяти. Возможно, база слишком велика или требует очень много памяти (для Argon2).
trans-unit.note: Error message when a long-running operation was cancelled due to the lack of free memory (RAM).
Explanation/notification when a long-running operation was cancelled by user

trans-unit.source: Quick AutoFill shows relevant entries right next to the password field, without opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Быстрое автозаполнение показывает нужные записи рядом с полями ввода, не открывая KeePassium.
trans-unit.note: Description of the Quick AutoFill feature.
Name of a feature that shows relevant entries directly next to the login/password forms.
Network security setting
Network connection. For example `Connection: WebDAV` or `Connection: MyCloud`.
Title of a section: username, password, etc

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will communicate directly with your online storage. This ensures reliable file transfer.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium будет напрямую общаться с вашим онлайн-хранилищем. Это обеспечивает надёжную передачу файлов.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Direct connection` sync method.
Error message: user credentials rejected by the server
Network address of a file
Name of a predefined Google Drive folder which contains user's own files
Name of a predefined GoogleDrive folder which contains files shared with this user
Name of a predefined OneDrive folder which contains user's own files
Name of a predefined OneDrive folder which contains files shared with this user
Network address of a WebDAV server
Action: authenticate to Dropbox account

trans-unit.source: Dropbox needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their Dropbox account
Action: authenticate to Google Drive account

trans-unit.source: Google Drive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: Необходимо повторно войти в Google Диск.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their Google Drive account
Action: authenticate to OneDrive account

trans-unit.source: OneDrive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their OneDrive account

trans-unit.source: Open sign-in page in private web browser mode
trans-unit.target: Открыть страницу входа в браузере в режиме инкогнито
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will assign file synchronization to the app of your storage provider. Some apps work better than others.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium поручит синхронизацию файлов приложению вашего хранилища. Некоторые приложения работают лучше других.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Integration via Files app` sync method.
Action: connect to a network server
Title: connection to a network storage
Name of an input field for entering the password again
Call to action (protect the app from unauthorized access)
Description of `Activate app protection` call to action.
Settings switch: whether AppLock is allowed to use Touch ID/Face ID. Example: 'Use Touch ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]

trans-unit.source: Ensures KeePassium is locked after you force-close the app or restart the device.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium будет заблокирован после принудительного закрытия приложения или перезагрузки устройства.
trans-unit.note: Explanation for the `Lock on App Launch` setting
Setting switch: whether to lock the app after it was terminated and relaunched.
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section. biometryTypeName will be either 'Touch ID' or 'Face ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section when biometric auth is not available.
Settings section: protection of the app from unauthorized access
A description/subtitle for Settings/AppLockTimeout options that trigger when the user has been idle for a while. For example: 'AppLock Timeout: 3 seconds (After last interaction)
A description/subtitle for Settings/AppLock/Timeout options that trigger when the app is minimized. For example: 'AppLock Timeout: 3 seconds (After leaving the app)
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Never'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Never'
Action that opens system settings or instructions

trans-unit.source: Before first use, you need to activate AutoFill in system settings.
trans-unit.target: Вначале нужно включить Автозаполнение в системных настройках.
trans-unit.note: Description for the AutoFill setup instructions
Title of an option: copy one-time password to clipboard when using AutoFill
Title of a help article on how to activate AutoFill.

trans-unit.source: AutoFill is not available in KeePassium for Intune.
trans-unit.target: Автозаполнение недоступно в KeePassium для Intune.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
Title of an option: automatically use the single best match found by AutoFill search
Title of AutoFill settings screen
Option in settings: whether to open the last used database automatically on start.
Confirmation dialog message to delete all backup files
An option in Settings. Please keep it short. Will be shown as 'Keep Backup Files: Forever'
Action to delete all backup files from the app. `ALL` is in capitals as a highlight. [backupFileCount: Int]
Status message: there are no backup files to delete

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClearKeyFileAssociations/Cleared/text] Associations between key files and databases have been removed.
trans-unit.source: Associations between key files and databases have been removed.
trans-unit.target: Связи между ключевыми файлами и базами паролей были удалены.
trans-unit.note: Text of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button
Title of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClearMasterKeys/Cleared/text] All master keys have been deleted.
trans-unit.source: All master keys have been deleted.
trans-unit.note: Text of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button
Title of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClipboardTimeout/description] When you copy some text from an entry, the app will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after this time.
trans-unit.source: When you copy some text from an entry, the app will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after this time.
trans-unit.target: При копировании какого-либо текста из записи он будет автоматически удалён из буфера обмена через заданное время.
trans-unit.note: Description of the clipboard/pasteboard timeout.
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Clipboard Timeout: Never'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Clipboard Timeout: Never'
Setting switch: whether to lock databases after device reboot.
Subtitle for `Data Protection` section in settings
Settings section: protection of databases, their keys and data inside them
Title of a settings section: backup of databases

trans-unit.id: [Settings/DatabaseLockTimeout/description] If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.source: If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.target: Если вы не используете приложение в течение некоторого времени, база паролей будет автоматически закрыта и заблокирована. Чтобы открыть её, нужно будет снова ввести мастер-пароль.
trans-unit.note: Description of the Database Lock Timeout
A description/subtitle for the 'DatabaseLockTimeout: Immediately'.
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Never'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Never'
Title of a setting: the time after which databases will be locked.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Refers to the most recent time when the entry was modified. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: Last Modified Date'.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: None', meanining that no entry details will be shown in any lists.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Refers to comments/notes field of the entry. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: Notes'.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: Password'.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Refers to the tags field of the entry. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: Tags'.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: URL'.
An option in Group Viewer settings. It refers to login information rather than person's name. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: User Name'.
Title of a settings section: which entry field to show along with entry title
Title of a settings section: sort order of groups and entries in a list
Title of list view configuration screen

trans-unit.source: This setting is managed by your organization.
trans-unit.note: Notification when corporate user tries to change an app setting controlled by organization's IT department.

trans-unit.source: Allow KeePassium to make network connections to external services?
trans-unit.target: Разрешить KeePassium устанавливать сетевые подключения к внешним службам?
trans-unit.note: Confirmation dialog message
Settings section: how/whether the app is allowed to use networks/Internet
Description of the `Stay Offline` mode.
Setting option: the app should work offline
Description of the `Allow Network Access` mode.
Setting option: the app is permitted to use online features
Action/button which resets some settings to their default state.
Section title in settings
List sorting option. Example: 'Sort by: Date Created'
List sorting option. Example: 'Sort by: Date Modified'
List sorting option (for file names). Example: 'Sort by: Name'
List sorting option (for groups and entries). Example: 'Sort by: Title'
List sorting option, when no sorting is selected. Example: 'Sort by: None'
Title of a sort options list. Example: 'Sort by: Name'
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service. Must match Microsoft's translation, see https://partner.microsoft.com/solutions/onedrive-for-business
Title of a file storage service option (for example: Dropbox, OneDrive, Other Services)
Template text of a bug report email
Name of an entry field. Acronym `TOTP` should not be translated.
Call to action in the Donations screen.
Call to action in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.target: Помогите нам поддерживать бесплатную версию KeePassium!
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the Donations screen. (free = gratis)
Text in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium is a free open-source app. You trust it with your most sensitive information. There are no ads, no spying, no nonsense — we respect you.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium — бесплатное приложение с открытым исходным кодом. Вы доверяете ему самую важную информацию. В нём нет рекламы, шпионских модулей, ничего лишнего — мы уважаем вас.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.source: Do you like KeePassium but don't need the premium features?
trans-unit.target: Нравится KeePassium, но не нужны премиум-функции?
trans-unit.note: Text in the Donations screen.
Notification after a successful donation.
Title of the tip box/donation screen.
Title of the tip box/donation screen.
Call to action, title of the tip box/donation screen.
Human-readable file location. Example: 'File Location: Remote server'
Human-readable file location. The file is situated either online / in cloud storage, or on the same device, but in some other app. Example: 'File Location: Cloud storage / Another app'
Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. 'Backup' is a dedicated directory for database backup files. Example: 'File Location: Internal backup'

Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. 'Inbox' is a special directory for files that are being imported. Can be also 'Internal import'. Example: 'File Location: Internal inbox'
Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. Example: 'File Location: Local copy'
Selector choice: don't use YubiKey to encrypt/decrypt database
Call for action: insert YubiKey 5Ci to the Lightning port
Call for action: touch the sides of YubiKey 5Ci to continue
Selector choice: use YubiKey to encrypt/decrypt database. For example: `Use YubiKey Slot 1`. [slotID: Int]
